articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Factbox: Countries vaccinating children against COVID-19 - Reuters
articles.description: The European Commission on Friday authorized Pfizer-BioNTech's (PFE.N), (22UAy.DE) COVID-19 vaccine for use in children as young as 12, paving the way for a broader roll-out in the EU after similar clearances in the United States and Canada.
articles.content: A healthcare worker administers the Pfizer/BioNTech coronavirus disease (COVID-19) vaccine, which was authorized by Canada to be used for children aged 12 to 15, at Woodbine Racetrack pop-up vaccine … [+3350 chars]

articles.author: Cheryl Chan
articles.title: With a whiff of the European fire ant, spiders get antsy: SFU study - Vancouver Sun
articles.description: Despite the findings, people should not use aggressive and invasive European fire ants to get rid of spiders, said researchers.
articles.content:
Article content
Scared of spiders? Ants could help.
A new study by Simon Fraser University researchers has found that chemicals given off by ants, their natural predator, are a deterrent for spider… [+2291 chars]
